DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Preconception Pregnancy Obesity Treatment Prevention Among Women A History Depression preliminary study provide lifestyle intervention woman history depression try conceive pregnant order prevent excessive pre-pregnancy weight , avoid excessive gestational weight gain , improve marker metabolic health . The treatment program consist 10 private session train clinician cost participant .
DOC.brief_title: Preconception Pregnancy Obesity Treatment Prevention Among Women With History Depression
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator evaluate new lifestyle intervention help woman history depression pregnant try conceive learn exercise , eat well , live healthy lifestyle . They interest examine therapy-based program positively impact eat exercise habit see treatment enjoyable . All participant receive intervention .
DOC.criteria: History depression Pregnant first trimester plan become pregnant within next year Ability give inform consent Age > = 18 < 45 year Overweight obese ( Body mass index > 25 kg/m^2 ) Unwilling/unable comply study procedure Endorsed item Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) Diagnosis anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa past month Diagnosis substance dependence past month Active suicidality ( Montgomery Asberg Depression Rating Scale ( MADRS ) item 10 score > 4 ) Exercising regularly ( i.e. , 5 day per week 30 min ) Neurologic disorder history head trauma Contraindications exercise diet intervention ( e.g. , comorbid nutritional metabolic disease , physical injury , contraindication exercise pregnant woman )
